title: Should we make a separate Dua for protection for EACH child when making Morning & Evening Athkaar
transcript: can we make a separate dua in the car in the morning in the evening for each children or one thicker is sufficient that car of the morning and the evening there's a long dua that is found on my website and always repeat it etc this dua is to be said in the morning and it's said to to be said on the evening and included in it the protection for your children for your family for your religion and for your wealth so this is sufficient for from uh it suffices you from reading a specific dua for all or for a particular child this covers them all inshallah you
